Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent the reservation for a hotel room(s)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reservation(int number, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, java.time.LocalDate checkinDate, int numberOfNights, int numberOfPeople, int numberOfRooms, java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> rooms)
      Constructor used when you want to override the default booking number generation
      Reservation(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, java.time.LocalDate checkinDate, int numberOfNights, int numberOfPeople, int numberOfRooms, java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> rooms)
      Creates a Reservation object

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the list of all the dates this reservation spans over
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Overriding the equals method of Object
      java.lang.String format()
      Formats the reservation into a readable line by line
      java.time.LocalDate getCheckinDate()
      Gets the check-in date for the reservation
      java.time.LocalDate getCheckoutDate()
      Calculates the checkout date by adding on the number of nights staying to the check in date
      Bill getDeposit()
      Returns a Bill object with the amount due set to €75
      static int getLastBookingNumber()
      Gets the last booking number
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name on the reservation
      int getNumber() 
      int getNumberOfNights()
      Gets the number of nights this reservation is booked for
      int getNumberOfPeople()
      Gets the number of people booked on this reservation
      int getNumberOfRooms()
      Gets the number of rooms booked
      java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> getRooms()
      Returns the list of all the rooms booked
      Bill getTotalCost()
      Returns the current Bill TotalCost without calculating the amount to pay for each room for each night
      Bill getTotalCostCalculated()
      Returns a Bill object with the amount due set to the total payable calculated using rates including deposit Also sets the amount due of the bill total cost associated with this object to this calculated cost, so if you want to get the current total cost, either not calculated yet or discounted yet, see getTotalCost()
      java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the type of the reservation
      void setDeposit(double amount)
      Sets the deposit in the deposit bill associated with this object to the amount specified
      static void setLastBookingNumber(int lastBookingNumber)
      Sets the last booking number used to update the new booking number
      void setTotalCost(double amount)
      Sets the total cost bill amount due to the amount specified
      java.lang.String toString()
      A summarised version of the string returned by format()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   java.time.LocalDate checkinDate,
                   int numberOfNights,
                   int numberOfPeople,
                   int numberOfRooms,
                   java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> rooms)
        Creates a Reservation object
        Parameters:
        name - the reservation name
        type - the type of booking S/AP
        checkinDate - the date of check-in
        numberOfNights - the number of nights the reservation is for
        numberOfPeople - the number of people staying in the reservation
        numberOfRooms - the number of rooms to book
        rooms - the rooms to add to the reservation

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int number,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   java.time.LocalDate checkinDate,
                   int numberOfNights,
                   int numberOfPeople,
                   int numberOfRooms,
                   java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> rooms)
        Constructor used when you want to override the default booking number generation
        Parameters:
        number - the booking number
        name - the name to have on the reservation
        type - the type of the reservation
        checkinDate - the checkin date
        numberOfNights - the number of nights
        numberOfPeople - the number of peple for this reservation
        numberOfRooms - the number of rooms
        rooms - the list of rooms booked

      • getTotalCost

        public Bill getTotalCost()
        Returns the current Bill TotalCost without calculating the amount to pay for each room for each night
        Returns:
        the total cost bill

      • getTotalCostCalculated

        public Bill getTotalCostCalculated()
        Returns a Bill object with the amount due set to the total payable calculated using rates including deposit Also sets the amount due of the bill total cost associated with this object to this calculated cost, so if you want to get the current total cost, either not calculated yet or discounted yet, see getTotalCost()
        Returns:
        a Bill object representing the total cost

      • getDeposit

        public Bill getDeposit()
        Returns a Bill object with the amount due set to €75
        Returns:
        a Bill object representing the deposit
